title: What Uttar Pradesh invoked in loudspeaker crackdown: 2017 HC order, 2018 Govt directives - The Indian Express
content: What Uttar Pradesh invoked in loudspeaker crackdown: 2017 HC order, 2018 Govt directives  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: In UP, thousands of "illegal" and "unauthorised" loudspeakers have been taken down, or their loudness capped, under "an existing government order of 2018, and set rules for sound decibel limits and court directions".
